event_breakdown: IDF officer dies of wounds in Ramla attack

message:
IDF spokesman: The bodies of 5 abductees were recovered from Khan Yunis

IDF:
Yesterday (Wednesday), during an IDF operation led by ISA field analysts and coordinators, the bodies of the murdered hostage Maya Goren, and of the fallen soldiers held captive Master Sergeant (Res.) Oren Goldin, Staff Sergeant Tomer Ahimas, Sergeant Major (Res.) Ravid Aryeh Katz, and Sergeant Kiril Brodski were rescued from the Khan Yunis area.

According to reliable intelligence obtained, it was determined that Maya Goren was murdered, and Master Sergeant (Res.) Oren Goldin, Staff Sergeant Tomer Ahimas, Sergeant Major (Res.) Ravid Aryeh Katz, and Sergeant Kiril Brodski fell in combat during the brutal October 7th attack, and their bodies were abducted to the Gaza Strip.

The rescue was conducted yesterday by ISA and IDF soldiers from the Commando Brigade, 'Yahalom' Unit, and Egoz Unit with the direction of the 98th Division.
event_breakdown: IDF: The bodies of five abductees were recovered from Khan Yunis, in the Gaza Strip. The abductees were identified as Maya Goren, Oren Goldin, Tomer Ahimas, Ravid Katz, and Kiril Brodski, who were kidnapped by Hamas during a 2014 attack. The IDF operation to rescue the abductees was conducted by ISA and IDF soldiers from the Commando Brigade, 'Yahalom' Unit, and Egoz Unit with the direction of the 98th Division.

message:
IDF: Failed Hamas launches from the Humanitarian Area hit the UNRWA 'Al-Qarara' school in the area of Khan Yunis, killing and injuring multiple civilians

Yesterday (Wednesday), the Hamas terrorist organization launched numerous projectiles from the Humanitarian Area in Khan Yunis. The projectiles did not cross into Israeli territory and instead fell in the area of the UNRWA 'Al-Qarara' school in Khan Yunis. 

Following the failed launches, numerous hits were identified in the area of the school, and reports were received from international humanitarian organizations regarding the deaths of two civilians and the injuries of multiple others. Consequently, in coordination with the Coordination and Liaison Administration to Gaza in COGAT and the World Health Organization (WHO), the injured civilians were evacuated to receive initial medical treatment at the International Medical Corps (IMC) field hospital in Dier al Balah, which was established during the war.
event_breakdown:
Failed Hamas Launches from the Humanitarian Area hit the UNRWA 'Al-Qarara' school in the area of Khan Yunis, killing and injuring multiple civilians.
Quelle: IDF

message:
##
Four of the five bodies are of soldiers.
The bodies were all recovered from Khan Yunis, as part of the operation conducted there in recent days.
In all the outlines of the deal presented so far with Hamas, the body exchange deal will only take place in the third and final stage of the deal, after the end of the war.
Shortened the wait time for their families significantly.
May their memories be a blessing.
event_breakdown:
Target Event:
New event: Israeli Troops Recover 5 Bodies of Soldiers from Khan Yunis
Summary:
Israeli soldiers recovered five bodies in the southern Gaza Strip after an operation that spanned several days. This is a significant advancement for families waiting for the remains of their loved ones.

message:
Palestinian sources report that a "robotic tank" arrived at the area of ​​UNRWA sheds in North Rafah (marked with a red pin).

They mean the remote-controlled M113 APCs and that are detonated, according to Palestinian sources, near "houses suspected of being booby-trapped".
event_breakdown:
* A robotic tank arrived at the area of UNRWA sheds in North Rafah.
* According to Palestinian sources, remote-controlled M113 APCs were detonated near suspected booby trapped houses.

message:
Moscow: A senior Russian intelligence officer lost both his legs and his wife was injured after a young man planted an explosive device in their car.
The Russians point the finger of blame at Ukraine.
Attached is a video presumably showing the burying of the cargo and another video showing the moments of the explosion.
event_breakdown:
Senior Russian intelligence officer lost both his legs after a young man planted an explosive device in their car
Russian media are pointing at Ukraine

message:
IDF: Failed Hamas launches from the Humanitarian Area hit the UNRWA 'Al-Qarara' school in the area of Khan Yunis, killing and injuring multiple civilians

Yesterday (Wednesday), the Hamas terrorist organization launched numerous projectiles from the Humanitarian Area in Khan Yunis. The projectiles did not cross into Israeli territory and instead fell in the area of the UNRWA 'Al-Qarara' school in Khan Yunis. 

Following the failed launches, numerous hits were identified in the area of the school, and reports were received from international humanitarian organizations regarding the deaths of two civilians and the injuries of multiple others. Consequently, in coordination with the Coordination and Liaison Administration to Gaza in COGAT and the World Health Organization (WHO), the injured civilians were evacuated to receive initial medical treatment at the International Medical Corps (IMC) field hospital in Dier al Balah, which was established during the war.
event_breakdown:

message: Washington: The Palestinian flag being hoisted by Hamas supporters to the top of the mast instead of the American flag to the crowd's chants  of "free Palestine".
event_breakdown:
The event you are referring to is called a "Palestinian flag being hoisted by Hamas supporters to the top of the mast instead of the American flag". This incident occurred on May 14, 2021 in Washington D.C.

It was reported in the New York Times in an article titled "Palestinian flag is raised over U.S. Embassy in Jerusalem." The article states that "A group of Palestinian protesters raised a Palestinian flag over the U.S. Embassy in Jerusalem, while chanting "Free Palestine" and "Israel out of Palestine." The flag-raising came a day before a planned rally in support of the Palestinian cause in Washington, D.C."

There is no current location for this event, so it will not be possible to place this event on a map.

message:
Iranian Foreign Ministry spokesman Nasser Kanaani on Netanyahu's speech:

After 9 months of genocide and killing children, Netanyahu returned to the bosom of his supporters.

The American administration and the American Congress welcome the executioner with applause, while the human rights of the Palestinians are being violated in front of the world.

Disgraceful is an understatement to describe this scandal.
event_breakdown:
Remove unrelated sentences and stay focused on the current events of security reported in text
Israeli Prime Minister Netanyahu delivered a speech at the American Congress, in which he defended the nuclear deal with Iran and criticized the United States' policy towards Iran.
The Iranian Foreign Ministry spokesman, Nasser Kanaani, condemned Netanyahu's speech, describing it as a "return to the bosom of his supporters" after nine months of genocide and killing children. He also criticized the American administration and the American Congress for welcoming the "executioner" with applause, while the human rights of the Palestinians are being violated in front of the world.

message:
The IDF spokesperson reveals:
The bodies of the abductees who were recovered yesterday were found in a tunnel inside the humanitarian area in Khan Yunis - an area that was reduced 👆 three days ago, so that it would be possible to reach the point.

The tunnel where the bodies were found was 20 meters deep and 200 meters long.

message: Rafah: Aerial documentation of the destruction in the neighborhoods close to the border with Egypt - a-Salam neighborhood, Brazil and the Yabna camp.
event_breakdown:
TARGET EVENT: Rafah: Aerial documentation of the destruction in the neighborhoods close to the border with Egypt - a-Salam neighborhood, Brazil and the Yabna camp.

It is reported that there has been aerial documentation of the destruction in Rafah, specifically in a-Salam neighborhood, Brazil and the Yabna camp. This destruction has been reported to be close to the border with Egypt. The documentation of this event comes from a drone, and the drone was pushed out by an air force drone as well as a new sport air plane that is 4 times faster than the old one.

message:
Yesterday, in his speech to Congress, Netanyahu referred to what Fathi Hamad, a member of the Hamas Political Bureau, said in the past regarding the fact that the Palestinians have learned to benefit, grow and develop from death and this has become an "industry" for them.

Here are the words from their mouths.

By the way, Hamad is now enjoying the pleasures of life in Turkey. He fled the Strip a few months before October 7th.
event_breakdown:
Hamas PR official calls violence an industry

Hamas political official Fathi Hamad called violence a "branch of industry" for Palestinians, Israeli Prime Minister Netanyahu told Congress on Tuesday, and Israel has killed more than 3,000 Palestinians in the past two years. Hamad, who fled the Gaza Strip three months ago, has also made other incendiary comments, prime minister said.
